Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Fix recipe scaling bug with whole numbers

Bug: formatQuantity\(\) was removing trailing zeros from whole numbers,
causing 500 to display as "5", 1000 as "1", etc.

Root cause: The regex /\\.?0+$/ was matching trailing zeros in any
number, not just after decimal points.

Fix: Only apply the trailing zero removal if the number contains a
decimal point. This preserves whole numbers \(500 stays "500"\) while
still cleaning up decimals \(2.50 becomes "2.5"\).

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
